post:
Our 50% off promotion for life will end next week, so this will be your last chance of the year to grab your VPS. Here is what you can get for your $7/month.

**512MB Dedicated RAM**
2 CPU Cores

VMware Control Panel Access (Upon Request)
Complimentary Weekly Backups
Purchase here: [http://corgitech.com/linux_vps.html](http://corgitech.com/linux_vps.html) Use Promo Code: **CORGI50**
_This code can be used on any of our packages.
_
We NEVER Oversell.
The Promotion is also valid for our other packages.
